value.value: £31,365 to £37,890 per annum, pro rata + 5% HCAS

description: <p>This is an exciting opportunity to support the 0-19 public health team to improve access to the health visiting service in the east of surrey as part of the surrey wide Children and Family Health Surrey (CFHS) contract. The service provides a single point of access for clients, stakeholders and other professionals. The role will involve offering information, guidance and support to clients, the implementation of processes to triage safeguarding information and correspondence from partnership agencies and support skill mix within the service. The service will be provided 8am-5pm Monday to Friday.</p>
title: Bank Health Visitor
